channel.title: [MUST READ] IRC Troubles [DO NOT REMOVE]
channel.description:
Ok, this isn't even funny anymore. You people really need to stop being dumbasses on IRC. So here's some nice little quotes from a log (http://rafb.net/p/gnEXum82.html) for you guys to suck on for a while.
20:22:05 -!- SportChick was kicked from #moparscape by Sergeant_Johnson [I don't want to kill you, it's just that you're too ugly to let live!]
The_Un-Named did this. This is completely unacceptable especially coming from a Global Moderator.
04:28:43 < quux> 8 hours ago, a staffer was kickbanned from this place and made fun of, repeatedly.
See Below.
04:46:01 < quux> [05\27-20:52] * Bebe_` discovers SportChick's picture at uglypeople.com
Oh look! Another Global Moderator being a jackass.
04:50:04 * regecks discovers quux's picture at uglypeople.com 04:50:07 < regecks> right clicked your name 04:50:08 < regecks> slaps 04:50:10 < regecks> uglypeople.com
More crap. Cut the shit guys, seriously.
04:52:11 < quux> I've been trying to tell you, trying to help you all, for some time now. I have spoken with you all publicly, and with many of you privately. 04:52:35 < quux> And I'm saying: quit yanking my chain. Fix this problem .. or you may not like the fix we impose.
^^^ This one was more recent while talking to SportChick in a PM.
Essentially, there is really 2-3 ways of handling it that I see 1. give up and let the channels die 2. convince everyone to change 3. the operators (or draft in new ones if necessary) need to start enforcing freenod epolicy but honestly, with the sort of behavior that we've seen so far, opping will be a *lot* of work and a relatively thankless job it's not impossible but you'd need people who are committed to making it work
Right now, 1 looks like the only possible solution. Well, it look like if we don't straighten up, we won't have an IRC Channel anymore. This is our final warning. If we keep doing stupid shit, we'll be gone in a second.

item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Fr33sc4p3, post:8, topic:102096”]The bad thing is the ‘No idleing rule’
You join a channel you ask a question they answer and kick you saying ’ NO IDLING!’[/quote]
Other then that it’s fine. There’s a channel called #australia - if you’re Australian then join. If you’re not Australian but wish you were then join.

Read full topic

item.title: [MUST READ] IRC Troubles [DO NOT REMOVE]
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Well, this topic can go. We’ve moved to irc.deltaanime.net - Type /server irc.deltaanime.net in your client, and then /join #mopar to join the channel.
I’ll miss freenode, but it’s probably best for everyone here and for everyone there. =\

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ikick221 ikick221
item.description:
@ikick221 wrote:

[quote=“lothy, post:27, topic:102095”][quote author=MybJames link=topic=146346.msg1399149#msg1399149 date=1180529241]
We just don’t belong on freenode, sure we can have intelligent discussions but there is no way to stop the massive flood of idiots.

Examples:
o haxed
Nothing implied. I liked it. I shared it. End.
rofl
you were still haxed tho.
[/quote]
I think that’s just a huge cop out. If everyone watched what they did it’d be fine.[/quote]

Question, Who died and made lothy boss?
no offense lothy,

Read full topic

item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

I sometimes am a complete asshole on IRC. But, I’m trying to make amends. What the fuck is wrong with everyone. I’m 13, and I seem to be able to fix my attitude on IRC, why can’t people fix theirs.

Read full topic

item.title: [MUST READ] IRC Troubles [DO NOT REMOVE]
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

daycrawler:

Lothy is turning it into a military. He’s flaming and will kick, mute, ban anyone who shares a different opinion then his. I know Frank, Seand will agree they were their last night.

Hmm, military? Hardly - you guys just had it too good. Kamu gave out 10 minute bans? A 5yr old gets worse. I’ll give you two choices: get with the program, or get out.

[quote=“lawl, post:5, topic:102096”][quote author=Fr33sc4p3 link=topic=146346.msg1395695#msg1395695 date=1180477869]
I never said you should be given a ban all i said to mopar on the IRC was

You should be handing out bans for people with the wrong attitude.

I dont see you in that sentence.
[/quote]
hah
ban for having a bad attitude
silliest thing i’ve heard
and thats exactly what lothy said too[/quote]
Your employer could fire you for having a bad attitude too. I’ve asked you to make an effort but you’d rather prove some kind of point and impress idiots. Not wanted. Maybe I’ll lift your ban in a week or two.

Read full topic

item.title: [MUST READ] IRC Troubles [DO NOT REMOVE]
item.dc:creator: @daycrawler daycrawler
item.description:
@daycrawler wrote:

[quote=“gikid, post:3, topic:102096”]Ok, daycrawler, if your going to turn this into ANOTHER flame fest then get out.

[quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=146346.msg1395534#msg1395534 date=1180475349]

Ok, this isn’t even funny anymore. You people really need to stop being dumbasses on IRC. So here’s some nice little quotes from a log (http://rafb.net/p/gnEXum82.html) for you guys to suck on for a while.

20:22:05 -!- SportChick was kicked from #moparscape by Sergeant_Johnson [I don’t want to kill you, it’s just that you’re too ugly to let live!]

The_Un-Named did this. This is completely unacceptable especially coming from a Global Moderator.

Err, the kick message was COMPLETELY random, you CANNOT set the kick message with Sergeant_Johnson.

And by the way, regecks` isn’t allowed back into the forums, why don’t you get a staff to kline him rather than bitch at us for him using a proxy?

04:28:43 < quux> 8 hours ago, a staffer was kickbanned from this place and made fun of, repeatedly.

See Below.[/quote]

Again, NOT me.

Also, don’t bitch at me for a mistake, I can’t do shit in the IRC.

Kamu kicked me for nothing, I don’t have OP and if I even dare kick or ban someone like regecks, fucking every opper will ban me.

Sorry, I was just going by what regecks said. And yes, Kamu and pd are complete dicks to me. They are the kinds of op’s we dont need.[/quote]
the other flame fest wasn’t a flame fest it was a debate. your skull is just too thick to say anything intelligent.

Read full topic
